review: 610 a good introduction to the roguelike genre the build a class system is fun and unique biggest downside is a lack of proper ui scaling so playing on a 4k monitor was an eyesore

there are lots of ways to die in this  there are also some pretty solid skill trees you can go down  magic is nicely powerful too  basically its a pretty decent roguelike
new to rougelite playing and this is a great introduction super tutorial and a nice toughincheek play tone make this a winner

this game is a blast the loop is really fun you explore loot and find a lore thats well done and full of humor its pace is controlled by you and you can change the difficulty if its too easyhard and theres a hardcore mode if youre feeling like you need even more difficulty definitely worth buying at full price dont wait for a sale

i cant believe ive never left a review for this dont let my time played fool you ive played over 100 hours offline years ago good game to really dig into if youre bored and i feel like ive always had new experiences playing just because theres sooo much content in this if you like brutal rogue likes and i mean no meta progression brutal check this out its definitely aged a bit since 2011 but its a formative game of mine

is good yes
was briefly obsessed with this game ages ago and was just hit with such nostalgia for it silly and addictive
such a good roguelike game lots of possibilities simple yet addictive will run in a powered potato

ive had this since jan 2012 it must of been on sale it deserves a good review  if you like quirky stupid laughable roguelike this is top tier its not for everyone but its deeply intricate which gives it hundreds of hours of fun 35 hours of game time is just touching the surface of the game mechanics go look at the 100 hour plus reviews not mine
as good as the day it was made timelessly funny and relentlessly weird with a lively modding community thats still active after more than a decade an excellent addition to the roguelike genre
one of my all time favorites still think about this game from time to time maybe gaslamp will reactivate and make a sequel someday one can only hope

this game is an extraordinary experience and ive likely barely scratched the surface of what it has to offer  the text written in the game is 100 pure comedy gold through and through  the builds you can make are bizarre fun and interesting  ive yet to delve into the crafting system and ive yet to actually finish the game but i absolutely adore everything about this game so far  also i just kicked an entire monster zoo to bits and smithereens as a vampire worth it

hard but manageable roguelike game the variation in builds and their non orthodox abilities has been a lot of fun to learn and experiment with it leaves the game feeling fresh rather than boring despite the age of the game and lack of some qol not to mention the sheer number of deaths

this game is great i get as much fun from reading the hilarious descriptions of objects full of jokes and obscure references as butchering diggles blobs and weird monsters as you can choose 7 skills among 36 51 with all dlc which are really worth it but the base game is also fun without them there are a lot of ways to combine them and each run can be very different i never get bored   ps  beware the green hornet he can block you for 5 turns and kill you at full health

if you are ready for hours of pretty strange and fun grinding this is a game for you it is pretty chill there is a lot to learn laught about the jokes and die unexpected i would recommend doing some random runs to learn the skill trees and just have fun playing permadeath feels like the way to go make it a true rougelike experience

one of the best tradrogues that still holds up i keep coming back to this one and its in my rl vocabulary shortlist when talking about modern rls there might be a tad bit of cringe humor but it wears that and its other inspirations on its sleeve there are so many combinations of jobs and skills and the handdrawn and pixeley style matches the game perfectly definitely one of the goat rls for the ages if youre looking for a tradrogue with some coffeebreakiness look no further
this game never takes itself seriously and for that i love it

a delightful turnbased dungeon crawl with peak 2010s humor not too cringe either kind of like munchkin in that way  the build variety is a hoot and you will die a lot but it has a great gameplay loop and plenty of charm was gifted the base game and after an hour i went to by all the dlc without hesitation   i do wish there was some progression between runs but that said its close adherence to the roguelike nature adds a special something

if youre looking for something with gameplay closer to old school roguelikes like nethack or adom and have a silly sense of humor this is the perfect game for you  ive put way more hours into it than are on my steam profile because i also own a drm free copy from elsewhere and its always worth coming back to
